verses.verse: Then I looked <S%H7200><s%>, and behold <S%H7549><s%>, in the firmament that was over the head <S%H7218><s%> of the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> there appeared <S%H7200><s%> above them as it were a sapphire <S%H5601><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>, as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of a throne <S%H3678><s%>.

And he spake <S%H559><s%> unto the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Go in <S%H935><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the whirling wheels <S%H1534><s%>, even under the cherub <S%H3742><s%>, and fill <S%H4390><s%> both thy hands <S%H2651><s%> with coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> from between <S%H996><s%> the cherubim <S%H3742><s%>, and scatter <S%H2236><s%> them over the city <S%H5892><s%>. And he went in <S%H935><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>.

Now the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> on the right side <S%H3225><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, when the man <S%H376><s%> went in <S%H935><s%>; and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>.

And the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> mounted up <S%H7311><s%> from the cherub <S%H3742><s%>, and stood over the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>; and the house <S%H1004><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and the court <S%H2691><s%> was full <S%H4390><s%> of the brightness <S%H5051><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s glory <S%H3519><s%>.

And the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> was heard <S%H8085><s%> even to the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, as the voice <S%H6963><s%> of God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%> when he speaketh <S%H1696><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H6680><s%>, when he commanded the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> from between the whirling wheels <S%H1534><s%>, from between the cherubim <S%H3742><s%>, that he went in <S%H935><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> a wheel <S%H212><s%>.

And the cherub <S%H3742><s%> stretched forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from between the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> unto the fire <S%H784><s%> that was between the cherubim <S%H3742><s%>, and took <S%H5375><s%> thereof <S%H5414><s%>, and put it into the hands <S%H2651><s%> of him that was clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%>, who took <S%H3947><s%> it and went out <S%H3318><s%>.
And there appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> the form <S%H8403><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%> under their wings <S%H3671><s%>.

And I looked <S%H7200><s%>, and behold <S%H702><s%>, four wheels <S%H212><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the cherubim <S%H3742><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> wheel <S%H212><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> one <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%>, and another <S%H259><s%> wheel <S%H212><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> another <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%>; and the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the wheels <S%H212><s%> was like <S%H5869><s%> unto a beryl <S%H8658><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>.
And as for their appearance <S%H4758><s%>, they four <S%H702><s%> had one <S%H259><s%> likeness <S%H1823><s%>, as if a wheel <S%H212><s%> had been within <S%H8432><s%> a wheel <S%H212><s%>.

When they went <S%H3212><s%>, they went <S%H3212><s%> in their four <S%H702><s%> directions <S%H7253><s%>: they turned <S%H5437><s%> not as they went <S%H3212><s%>, but to the place <S%H4725><s%> whither the head <S%H7218><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> they followed <S%H3212><s%> it <S%H5437><s%>; they turned not as they went <S%H3212><s%>.

And their whole body <S%H1320><s%>, and their backs <S%H1354><s%>, and their hands <S%H3027><s%>, and their wings <S%H3671><s%>, and the wheels <S%H212><s%>, were full <S%H4392><s%> of eyes <S%H5869><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, even the wheels <S%H212><s%> that they four had <S%H702><s%>.
As for the wheels <S%H212><s%>, they were called <S%H7121><s%> in my hearing <S%H241><s%>, the whirling wheels <S%H1534><s%>.

And every one <S%H259><s%> had four <S%H702><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%>: the first <S%H259><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> was the face <S%H6440><s%> of the cherub <S%H3742><s%>, and the second <S%H8145><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> was the face <S%H6440><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>, and the third <S%H7992><s%> face the face <S%H6440><s%> of a lion <S%H738><s%>, and the fourth <S%H7243><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of an eagle <S%H5404><s%>.
And the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> mounted up <S%H7426><s%>: this is the living creature <S%H2416><s%> that I saw <S%H7200><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar <S%H3529><s%>.

And when the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> went <S%H3212><s%>, the wheels <S%H212><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> beside them <S%H681><s%>; and when the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> to mount up <S%H7311><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>, the wheels <S%H212><s%> also <S%H1992><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> not from beside them <S%H681><s%>.

When they stood <S%H5975><s%>, these stood <S%H5975><s%>; and when they mounted up <S%H7311><s%>, these mounted up <S%H7426><s%> with them <S%H7307><s%>: for the spirit of the living creature was in them <S%H2416><s%>.

And the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> from over the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> over the cherubim <S%H3742><s%>.

And the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%>, and mounted up <S%H7426><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%> when they went forth <S%H3318><s%>, and the wheels <S%H212><s%> beside <S%H5980><s%> them <S%H5975><s%>: and they stood at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the east <S%H6931><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>; and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was over them above <S%H4605><s%>.

This is the living creature <S%H2416><s%> that I saw <S%H7200><s%> under the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar <S%H3529><s%>; and I knew <S%H3045><s%> that they were cherubim <S%H3742><s%>.

Every one <S%H259><s%> had four <S%H702><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%>, <S%H259><s%> and every one <S%H259><s%> four <S%H702><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%>; and the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> was under their wings <S%H3671><s%>.

And as for the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of their faces <S%H6440><s%>, they were the <S%H1992><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%> which I saw <S%H7200><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar <S%H3529><s%>, their appearances <S%H4758><s%> and themselves <S%H3212><s%>; they went every one <S%H376><s%> straight <S%H5676><s%> forward <S%H6440><s%>.
